article: The hotel was in a _ street and seemed to agree with one who _ a good sleep after a tiring trip. The woman manager _ me to my room. When I asked her about dinner, she said it was _ at six and I had 3 _ it." Never mind , I'm not very hungry." I said in a friendly voice. " I'll just have a _ and then go to a restaurant." "What!" she said, raising her eyebrows . "This is a respectable hotel, young man. If you want, better go somewhere else. " She spoke as if a glass of beer were a _ liquid. I felt my _ back through the dark streets after dining outside. I knocked loudly on the door but nobody _ . It was a long time _ the lady opened the door. "What's going on?" she said coldly ." Guests are to be back by ten. The rule is for everyone." I went to my room and tried to sleep. The bed was _ and the sheets and blankets were damp. _ of all, the whole hotel trembled when the church clock _ every quarter of an hour. Just before dawn, I finally went to sleep. "Did you sleep well last night, young man?" asked the old lady the next morning. " _ speaking, I don't think I could _ another night here." I replied. "I _ slept at all." "That's because you were _ all night drinking!" She said disapprovingly.
